recipes.mol: Clone and setup MOL from Github

name: mol
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Clones MOL from github and sets up apps

= REQUIREMENTS:

Opscode cookbooks, http://github.com/opscode/cookbooks/tree/master:

* git
